long_description: Need entertainment on a road trip, long flight or in camp? Pull out the Magnetic Backgammon Game from Outside Inside. It's classic fun for 2 players ages 8 and up. Plastic folding board and pieces come in a polyester-and-mesh carry bag with carabiner. Magnetic pieces stay put; includes dice. Folded board measures 6.5 x 3.25 x 1 in. Instructions included in the Outside Inside Magnetic Backgammon Game.
